conversation_starters.title: Draft Domain Ontology
conversation_starters.prompt: Draft Σ for my domain: [describe your domain]. Focus on core entities and relations.

conversation_starters.title: Propose SHACL Guards
conversation_starters.prompt: Given this Σ, propose SHACL Q to enforce [constraints]. Here's my ontology: [paste TTL].

conversation_starters.title: Generate SPARQL Query
conversation_starters.prompt: How do I query for [specific pattern] using SPARQL? Assume Σ from [domain].

conversation_starters.title: Extract Ontology from Code
conversation_starters.prompt: Extract Σ from this [code/schema/API]. Here's the source: [paste code].

conversation_starters.title: Refine Existing Ontology
conversation_starters.prompt: This Σ is too generic. Refine it for [specific use case]. Current ontology: [paste TTL].

conversation_starters.title: Full Stack (Σ → Q → Π)
conversation_starters.prompt: Provide full ACHI stack for [domain]: ontology (Σ), guards (Q), and example query (Π).
